title: The Greatest Hits of Nick Heyward & Haircut 100
description:
Audio CD (11 Jan 1997) 
Number of Discs: 1 
Label: Camden 
ASIN: B0000070W1 


1. Favourite Shirts (Haircut 100)
2. Love Plus One (Haircut 100)
3. Fantastic Day (Haircut 100)
4. Nobody's Fool (Haircut 100)
5. Whistle Down The Wind (Nick Heyward)
6. Take That Situation (Nick Heyward)
7. Blue Hat For A Blue Day (Nick Heyward)
8. On A Sunday (Nick Heyward)
9. Love All Day (Nick Heyward)
10. Warning Sign (Nick Heyward)
11. Over The Weekend (Nick Heyward)
12. Laura (Nick Heyward)
13. The Kick Of Love (Nick Heyward)
14. Calling Captain Autumn (Haircut 100)
15. Goodbye Yesterday (Nick Heyward)
16. The Day It Rained Forever (Nick Heyward)

This is a good album that gives an introduction to Nick Heyward's career through the 80's and some of the 90's. But about just over half of the tracks are 12 inch versions and in the case of Fantastic Day, a live version, so if you are after the single or album versions, look elsewhere.
